sentences.en: Directions for use: tear open wrapper , break off desired dosage and consume.
sentences.cn: 使用说明: 撕开包装, 掰下所需分量并吃掉.

sentences.en: Fixed error in file wrapper causing bad file copies.
sentences.cn: 修正在档案封装造成的坏档复制.

sentences.en: Hastily she slipped off her wrapper and stood clad only in her chemise.
sentences.cn: 她急忙把睡衣脱了,身上只剩下一件无袖衬衫.

sentences.en: In addition, many text wrapper is contained by the multicolor.
sentences.cn: 另外, 目前许多包装物上的文字也是由多色叠印而成.

sentences.en: Let's pull away the wrapper first.
Pull away the wrapper, and you will see what the periodical is.
sentences.cn: 拉去包纸, 你就会知道里面是什么杂志.

sentences.en: She peeled off the wrapper of the box.
sentences.cn: 她扯掉了盒子外的包装纸.

sentences.en: She sat up, hugging her wrapper close to her , her eyes searching his face.
sentences.cn: 她坐起身来, 紧紧抱住她的披肩不放, 两只眼睛紧张地在他脸上搜索着.

sentences.en: The mapper trapped in the gap tapped the tap wrapper with strap.
sentences.cn: 陷在缝中的制图者用皮带轻击塞子套.

sentences.en: The mapper trapped in the gap tapped the wrapper with strap.
sentences.cn: 陷在缝中的制图者用皮带轻击书皮.

sentences.en: The primitive data types also have " wrapper " classes for them.
sentences.cn: 主数据类型也拥有自己的 “ 封装器 ” (wrapper) 类.

sentences.en: The wrapper method commonly used gas is nitrogen, dioxide and ammonia.
sentences.cn: 该包装法常用的气体是氮气 、 二氧化碳和氨气.

sentences.en: Then at the wrapper for any differences the API.
sentences.cn: 然后看看wrapper从中找出任何API上的区别.

sentences.en: We use a polyphone wrapper for each silk blouse.
sentences.cn: 丝绸女衫的包装是每一件装一只聚乙烯口袋.

trans.tran_cn: 包装材料；[包装] 包装纸；书皮
trans.tran_en: the piece of paper or plastic that covers something when it is sold

trans.tran_cn: （食品等的）包装材料，包装纸，包装塑料，（腰际和腿部的）围裹式服装
